[.........] and may He not render your place vacant.
[Verily, I underst]ood your note, and I have already paid to the slave-girl
the two dirhams and two thirds, as you have ordered.
Ich bin - Gott stärke Dich - in einem Zustand, der Dich (nur) freuen kann; ich preise Gott while I am - may God exalt you - in a state which will distress you, and I praise God
for both of them [...] für ihn. ....
